mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_ID as boardId, b.BOARD_TITLE as boardTitle, b.BOARD_CONTENT as boardContent, b.BOARD_REGISTER_DATE as boardRegisterDate, b.BOARD_VIEWS as boardViews , b.MEMBER_INDEX as memberIndex, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME as memberNickname FROM board b INNER JOIN member m ON b.MEMBER_INDEX = m.MEMBER_INDEX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, BOARD_VIEWS, MEMBER_INDEX, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE) values(#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent},DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), 0, 2, now())
mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE as boardUpdateDate, b.BOARD_ID as boardId, b.BOARD_TITLE as boardTitle, b.BOARD_CONTENT as boardContent, b.BOARD_REGISTER_DATE as boardRegisterDate, b.BOARD_VIEWS as boardViews , b.MEMBER_INDEX as memberIndex, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME as memberNickname, i.MEMBER_UPLOAD_IMAGE_PATH as memberUploadImagePath, i.MEMBER_UPLOAD_IMAGE_NAME as memberUploadImageName FROM board b INNER JOIN member m ON b.MEMBER_INDEX = m.MEMBER_INDEX INNER JOIN MEMBER_UPLOAD_IMAGE i ON b.BOARD_ID = i.BOARD_ID WHERE b.BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
SELECT BOARD_ID as boardId FROM board order by BOARD_ID desc limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE = now(), BOARD_VIEWS = 0 WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
